title: Dallas Mavericks ' revenue 2001 to 2019
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.

Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2003/04 to 2005/06, roughly constant from 2005/06 to 2009/10, slightly increasing from 2009/10 to 2010/11, slightly decreasing from 2010/11 to 2011/12, and finally slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2010/11 and 2011/12.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 166.0 was reported at Year 2010/11
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 117.0 was reached at Year 2003/04
